---
title: "Setting Billing Alarm"
date: last-modified
---

Email alert to let us know when we reach certain dollars threshold.

Only the root account has access to modify billing information

1. Billing dashboard
2. Billing Preferences
    - Receive Free Tier Usage Alerts (Enter an e-mail)
    - Receive Billing Alerts
    - Manage Billing Alerts
    - In CloudWatch go to Billing
    - Create Alarm
    - Configuration, then Next
    - Create a New Topic
    - Set an e-mail endpoint
    - Set a name
    - Create Alarm
    - View SNS subscriptions
    - Go to your e-mail and confirm the SNS
